show.title: Gandhi-um Bagathsing-um
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/guqNES
show.description: Mahatma Gandhi yum Bhagat Singh um ennaikume India makkaloda manasa vittu neengaatha rendu perum suthanthira porraatta thalaivargal. Avangalai pathina thagavalgalaiyum, avanga kadanthu vantha paathaiyaum intha book moolama neenga therinjukalaam. Vaanga oru varalaatru payanam seiyalaam.
show.description_secondary: Mahatma Gandhi yum Bhagat Singh um ennaikume India makkaloda manasa vittu neengaatha rendu perum suthanthira porraatta thalaivargal. Avangalai pathina thagavalgalaiyum, avanga kadanthu vantha paathaiyaum intha book moolama neenga therinjukalaam. Vaanga oru varalaatru payanam seiyalaam.

author.name: Shafin Prem
author.bio: delivering the best in your feed

episodes.title: 4. Bhagat Singh in Suya Kalvi Part 2
